entries.journal_entry_description: Gendra told you how to get to the Rebel pilot trainer.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to head to the shuttle port so you can learn to fly from the Rebel pilot trainer in Mos Espa.
entries.task01_message_box_text: Ah, you've found the shuttle port. Use the Travel Terminal to buy yourself a ticket to Mos Espa. Select the planetary map to see all the available shuttleports on this planet. Next, speak to the nearby droid, who is named, Ticket Collector, to board your shuttle. When you get to Mos Espa follow the next waypoint I give you to the Rebel pilot trainer. When you're done you may want to come back to Mos Eisley on the shuttle, but that's up to you.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Rebel Pilot trainer will be able to teach you to fly against the oppressive Imperial Navy.
